subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
Two possibilities:
* {{Han compound|女|帚|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=woman}}, as supported by the latest Old Chinese reconstructions; or
* {{Han compound|女|帚|ls=ic|t1=woman|t2=broom}} – a woman with a broom.
